definition: tinea cruris, fungal skin infection of the groin/dermatomycosis, esp. sexually transmitted/jock itch

thigh/part of a whole/portion of a sum/(stock) share/strand of a thread/low-level administrative unit, translated as "section" or "department" etc, ranked below 科[ke1]/classifier for long winding things like ropes, rivers etc/classifier for smoke, smells etc: thread, puff, whiff/classifier for bands of people, gangs etc/classifier for sudden forceful actions

sentences.english: Tinea cruris is a fungal pruritic dermatitis in the inguinal region.
sentences.chinese: 股癬是一種真菌在腹股溝區的瘙癢性皮炎。

sentences.english: When the fungus that causes jock itch targets the feet, you have athlete’s foot.
sentences.chinese: 當引發你股癬的真菌感染你的雙腳時，你就會得腳氣。

sentences.english: The tine a that happens at ham root ministry calls a tine a.
sentences.chinese: 發生於大腿根部的癬則稱爲股癬。
